title: Wii Wads
description:
A huge Assortment of wads for the Nintendo wii , to be installed with the Homebrew Channel or Twilight Princess Hack (Which I have included). Below is the files available. Note I have a PAL system so those with American or Jap ntsc systems beware of the chance of bricking your wii. I am not going to be responsible for bricking your wiis.  

  * wads
          Channels
                + Wii Internet Channel.wad (38.71 megabyte) PAL
                  
                  homebrew_browser
    
                  :boot.elf (852.52 kilobyte)
 
                  :icon.png (7.33 kilobyte)
                
                  :meta.xml (3.77 kilobyte)
           
            Saves are the Twilight Princess hack. I suggest using it straight away 
            to install the homebrew channel.
